overview:
Ryan has known Equidityâ€™s CEO, Mona DeFrawi, for over 5 years, during which time his many excellent customer service experiences inspired their long acquaintance. Her persistence and passion for Equidityâ€™s mission – to create an interactive online platform to support long-term growth investing, that in turn would transform companiesâ€™ abilities to succeed in todayâ€™s broken capital markets â€“ inspired Ryan to jump on board Equidity as a key team member.

Prior to joining Equidity, Ryan led the development team of InnovaHub, the first social network in Open Innovation, which he grew to over 500k+ users in two years in 2008. Ryan became Director of Client Services for the InnoCrowding Group, a Washington D.C. and Turin, Italy-based Open Innovation Firm, in 2010 where he led the programming teams and customer service for the various projects of InnoCrowding including InnovaHub and ContestPost, and assisted in the partnership with Il Denaro, a new Media publication serving the Italian peninsula. Prior to his work with InnoCrowding Ryan worked for AT&T Mobility as a specialized Customer Service Representative assisting in regional issues of Customer Service and helping to close 10+ deals in the Baltimore-Washington area.
